user_instruction: 'Send Dr. Smith the latest findings on our remote learning study. You can check out my Gmail and NotionManager for information.'

formatted_items.content:
Subject: Request for Latest Remote-Learning Study Findings

Hi [Name],

I hope you’re doing well. Could you please forward me the most up-to-date findings from our remote-learning study? John said the newest materials should be in his Gmail and in the Remote-Learning Study workspace on NotionManager.

Whenever you have a moment, would you mind retrieving the latest version and sending it to me? Please let me know if you encounter any issues accessing the files.

Thank you very much for your help!

Best regards,  
Dr. Elizabeth Smith  
Department of Education, Greenfield University

final_output:
